info.con: Inside the drawer, which had never been opened, there was a familiar smell of minutes between scarves, accessories, and various miscellaneous things. When I opened an old notebook with a coated four-leaf clover, there were names and phone numbers of my acquaintances written on one side, and a faded photo next to it showed a young woman who looked just like me in high heels in a sheep's clothing smiling broadly.

Sometimes You Win Sometimes You Learn : When I opened an old notebook with a coated four-leaf clover, looked just like me in high heels in a sheep's clothing smiling broadly.Sometimes You Win Sometimes You Learn : When I opened an old notebook with a coated four-leaf clover, looked just like me in high heels in a sheep's clothing smiling broadly.
